snippet: “I could say sitting right behind home base when the Yankees beat the Red Sox … but I would never ever say anything like that. What was I possibly thinking?” — George Pataki, addressing New Hampshire Republicans, when asked about his best...
abstract: “I could say sitting right behind home base when the Yankees beat the Red Sox … but I would never ever say anything like that. What was I possibly thinking?” — George Pataki, addressing New Hampshire Republicans, when asked about his best moment in public life.

headline.main: Verbatim: A Yankee Candidate in Red Sox Country
